article:
I have a cousin called Alex , he is an _ boy. Now he with my family  lives  in a flat of LianYungang. The building is _ a busy street and has 16 floors . There are 4 people in my family , including   _ .We live on the  _  floor . Our house is very _ . It has 6 rooms. But I like being with my cousin, so I _ a bedroom with Alex. We often listen to music in our bedroom. Our _ place is the balcony. We can play games, _ comics and chat with friends there. When my mother _ meals for us in the kitchen , we often go there to help her. There is a nice _ room. After dinner, we like to watch TV and read newspapers there. It is very beautiful and quiet here.
One Sunday morning, Alex goes out . He wants to buy  _  iphone 6 Plus but he gets lost. He doesn't know  _  to go . Finally, a girl in our neibourhood happens to see him and helps him find the mall. He says our neighbours are very _ and he likes our city.
